players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I am not the one who killed Diana. I believe we should focus on finding the real culprit and work together as a team to ensure the safety of our village."
You: "Bob, can you tell us what happened last night? Did you see or hear anything suspicious?"
